function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clear evidence on the best efficiency models for decision-making processes","Impact":"Ineffective decision-making and potential inefficiencies in disaster and pandemic response","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research and analysis to determine the most effective decision-making process for different scenarios","Technologies":"Big data, machine learning, artificial intelligence, remote sensing","People":"Government officials, policy makers, public administrators","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, technology experts"},{"Description":"Failure to take advantage of new technologies for implementing innovative governance models","Impact":"Limited capacity to effectively face disaster and pandemic situations and utilize data for planning and decision-making","Mitigation":"Promote adoption of emerging technologies for disaster management, invest in technology infrastructure, and provide training for technology utilization","Technologies":"Internet of things, cloud computing, social media communication, blockchain","People":"Government agencies, public administrators, technology experts","Owner":"Government agencies, technology companies, training institutions"}]}
